0.text: Innate - Scarecrow Effigy: Fiddlesticks begins the game with an exclusive  Scarecrow Effigy, which permanently occupies the trinket slot. Fiddlesticks can pretend to be an Effigy by standing still and not acting nor being acted upon for 2 seconds, during which it adjusts its body into a scarecrow and extends its arm out to expose its lantern.
0.html: Innate - Scarecrow Effigy: Fiddlesticks begins the game with an exclusive Scarecrow Effigy, which permanently occupies the trinket slot. Fiddlesticks can pretend to be an Effigy by standing still and not acting nor being acted upon for 2 seconds, during which it adjusts its body into a scarecrow and extends its arm out to expose its lantern.
markedPassages: Scarecrow Effigy

1.text: Innate - A Harmless Scarecrow: From level 6 onward, placing an  Effigy also summons a  Sweeper Drone at the location for 6 seconds.
1.html: Innate - A Harmless Scarecrow: From level 6 onward, placing an Effigy also summons a Sweeper Drone at the location for 6 seconds.
markedPassages: Effigy
Sweeper Drone

0.text: Passive: While Fiddlesticks has been out of combat for at least 2.5 seconds and is not  visible to the enemy team, or is pretending to be an  Effigy, its next damaging ability will additionally  fear targets hit for a duration.
0.html: Passive: While Fiddlesticks has been out of combat for at least 2.5 seconds and is not visible to the enemy team, or is pretending to be an Effigy, its next damaging ability will additionally fear targets hit for a duration.
markedPassages: visible
Effigy
fear

1.text: Active: Fiddlesticks launches a crow at the target enemy that deals magic damage and  fears them for a duration. Terrify has a minimum damage threshold and is capped at 400 against  monsters.
1.html: Active: Fiddlesticks launches a crow at the target enemy that deals magic damage and fears them for a duration. Terrify has a minimum damage threshold and is capped at 400 against monsters.

0.content: 6 / 7 / 8 / 9 / 10% (+ 2% per 100 AP) of target's current health

markedPassages: fears
monsters

6 / 7 / 8 / 9 / 10% (+ 2% per 100 AP) of target's current health

2.text: Targets feared by Fiddlesticks by any means cannot be affected by it again for a duration equal to Terrify's cooldown. Against these targets, Terrify's  damage and minimum threshold are doubled.
2.html: Targets feared by Fiddlesticks by any means cannot be affected by it again for a duration equal to Terrify's cooldown. Against these targets, Terrify's damage and minimum threshold are doubled.

0.text: Active: Fiddlesticks forms a  tether between itself and each nearby enemy over the cast time, then  channels for up to 2 seconds to harvest their souls,  revealing them in the process.
0.html: Active: Fiddlesticks forms a tether between itself and each nearby enemy over the cast time, then channels for up to 2 seconds to harvest their souls, revealing them in the process.
markedPassages: tether
channels
revealing

1.text: While Fiddlesticks is channeling, the tethered enemies are dealt magic damage every 0.25 seconds, with the final tick at the end of the channel dealing additional magic damage. Bountiful Harvest deals 135% damage against  monsters and 50% damage against  minions.
1.html: While Fiddlesticks is channeling, the tethered enemies are dealt magic damage every 0.25 seconds, with the final tick at the end of the channel dealing additional magic damage. Bountiful Harvest deals 135% damage against monsters and 50% damage against minions.
markedPassages: monsters
minions

2.text: Fiddlesticks  heals itself for a percentage of the pre-mitigation damage dealt, modified to 45% against monsters and 15% against minions.
2.html: Fiddlesticks heals itself for a percentage of the pre-mitigation damage dealt, modified to 45% against monsters and 15% against minions.
markedPassages: heals

3.text: Bountiful Harvest ends if all targets have died or broken their tethers. If the channel was not interrupted, 60% of the  current cooldown is refunded.
3.html: Bountiful Harvest ends if all targets have died or broken their tethers. If the channel was not interrupted, 60% of the  current cooldown is refunded.
markedPassages: current cooldown

4.text: A nearby enemy is required to cast this ability. The target does not have to be  visible to be tethered by this ability.

0.text: Active: Fiddlesticks slashes the target location with its scythe, dealing magic damage to enemies within the area and  slowing them for 1.25 seconds.
0.html: Active: Fiddlesticks slashes the target location with its scythe, dealing magic damage to enemies within the area and slowing them for 1.25 seconds.
markedPassages: slowing

1.text: Enemies hit in the center of the area are also  silenced for 1.25 seconds.
1.html: Enemies hit in the center of the area are also silenced for 1.25 seconds.
markedPassages: silenced

0.text: Active: Fiddlesticks  channels for 1.5 seconds, then  blinks to the target location upon completion with a murder of crows flying wildly around it for 5 seconds, dealing magic damage every 0.25 seconds to nearby enemies.
0.html: Active: Fiddlesticks channels for 1.5 seconds, then blinks to the target location upon completion with a murder of crows flying wildly around it for 5 seconds, dealing magic damage every 0.25 seconds to nearby enemies.

blinks

textContent.text: Active: Fiddlesticks forms a  tether between itself and each nearby enemy over the cast time, then  channels for up to 2 seconds to harvest their souls,  revealing them in the process.

textContent.text: Bountiful Harvest ends if all targets have died or broken their tethers. If the channel was not interrupted, 60% of the  current cooldown is refunded.
textContent.html: Bountiful Harvest ends if all targets have died or broken their tethers. If the channel was not interrupted, 60% of the  current cooldown is refunded.

textContent.text: A nearby enemy is required to cast this ability. The target does not have to be  visible to be tethered by this ability.
textContent.html: A nearby enemy is required to cast this ability. The target does not have to be visible to be tethered by this ability.

textContent.text: Active: Fiddlesticks slashes the target location with its scythe, dealing magic damage to enemies within the area and  slowing them for 1.25 seconds.
textContent.html: Active: Fiddlesticks slashes the target location with its scythe, dealing magic damage to enemies within the area and slowing them for 1.25 seconds.

textContent.text: Enemies hit in the center of the area are also  silenced for 1.25 seconds.

textContent.text: Active: Fiddlesticks  channels for 1.5 seconds, then  blinks to the target location upon completion with a murder of crows flying wildly around it for 5 seconds, dealing magic damage every 0.25 seconds to nearby enemies.

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Supersonic: Dash 125 to 275 units in the target direction, though not through terrain, unleashing an arc of 7 rockets in the same direction that deal 125 (+ 15% AP) magic damage to enemies hit. Afterwards, gain 30% bonus movement speed while facing nearby enemy champions for 1.5 seconds (40 second cooldown).
Supersonic resets the user's basic attack timer.
active.originText:
UNIQUE – SUPERSONIC:  Dash 125 to 275 units in the target direction, though not through terrain, unleashing an arc of 7 rockets in the same direction that deal 125 (+ 15% AP) magic damage to enemies hit. Afterwards, gain 30% bonus movement speed while facing nearby enemy champions for 1.5 seconds (40 second cooldown).
Supersonic resets the user's basic attack timer.
